titles: Three considerations proposed to Mr. William Pen concerning the validity and security of his new magna charta for liberty of conscience by a Baptist ; which may be worthy the consideration of all the Quakers and of all my dissenting brethren also that have votes in the choice of Parliament-men.
author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Penn, William, 1644-1718. --  Excellent priviledge of liberty and property.
